Title:
Neoalbatrellus odorus sp. nov. (Albatrellaceae, Russulales)
from Southwest China
Abstract:
A new species, Neoalbatrellus odorus sp. nov., is
described based on morphological characters and molecular data. It is
characterized by fleshy basidiomata with viscid and dark bluish grey to
blackish blue pileal surface which becoming black and glossy after
drying, white pore surface, greyish lavender stipe, simple septate
generative hyphae, and thick-walled and non-amyloid basidiospores.
Phylogenetic analysis of Neoalbatrellus and its related genera was
inferred from ITS rDNA sequences, which indicates that the new species
belongs to Neoalbatrellus.
